title: Why do I not gain as much LP for winning against higher players compared to equally ranked players?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
The other day I was in the dynamic q with some friends  who were ranked higher than me (I'm S4, they are both S1) and we matchup against 2 G5 and 1 G3 player. Once I won I was expecting to get a nice chuck of LP to get me into my promos except I was disappointed when I only received 18 LP for the win. I thought this was strange because when I play and win against players equal to my rank I can normally pull 23-27LP per win. 

I was just wondering if anybody could explain to me why I gain less LP for winning against higher ranked players. Thanks in advance :)
